charaepi_ch0182_00_ilima/2301_1101_0100_:
After being approached by Ilima,
[Name:PlayerNickname ] joined him in a
Pokémon battle.
charaepi_ch0182_00_ilima/2301_1101_0200_:
The battle ended in victory for
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0182_00_ilima/2301_1201_0400_:
I’m glad for the chance to test out my new tactics,
too!
charaepi_ch0182_00_ilima/2301_1201_0500_:
Ever since I arrived on Pasio, I’ve been exploring
new battle strategies especially suited for
sync pairs.
charaepi_ch0182_00_ilima/2301_1201_0600_:
When battling as a team, it’s important to
position yourself well so you don’t interfere
with your allies.
charaepi_ch0182_00_ilima/2301_1201_0700_:
That’s why I was simulating how to maximize
power while minimizing movement!
charaepi_ch0182_00_ilima/2301_1201_0800_: However, that seems to have led to my defeat...
charaepi_ch0182_00_ilima/2301_1201_0900_:
Looks like when trying to keep still, Gumshoos and
I still can’t make the most of our strengths.
charaepi_ch0182_00_ilima/2301_0401_1100_:
Indeed. However, when things don’t go according
to plan, it only makes me want to try again!
charaepi_ch0182_00_ilima/2301_0402_1300_:
You’re right. That’s what’s fun about Pokémon
battles, isn’t it?
charaepi_ch0182_00_ilima/2301_1201_1400_:
I’ll take this as a challenge to come up with
another strategy!
charaepi_ch0182_00_ilima/2301_1201_1500_:
Oh? I wonder if the sun going down is making
him sleepy.
charaepi_ch0182_00_ilima/2301_1201_1600_:
Gumshoos are resilient Pokémon, but they’re
diurnal, so by the time the sun sets, they tend
to run out of energy.
charaepi_ch0182_00_ilima/2301_1201_1700_: It’s part of his nature, so I’d rather not push him.
charaepi_ch0182_00_ilima/2301_1201_1800_:
Maybe it’d be best to battle in the afternoon,
when Gumshoos can give it his all.
charaepi_ch0182_00_ilima/2301_1201_1900_:
Would you mind battling me again when
Gumshoos can best put his strength to use?
charaepi_ch0182_00_ilima/2301_1201_2000_: Thank you. I’ll think of a new strategy by then!
charaepi_ch0182_00_ilima/2301_1201_2100_:
Since Gumshoos is looking tired, how about we
give it a rest for the day? I’ve some delicious
sweets prepared.
charaepi_ch0182_00_ilima/2301_1201_2200_:
While studying abroad, I grew fond of a sweet
called Lumiose Galette, so I’ve been trying things
on Pasio as well.
charaepi_ch0182_00_ilima/2301_1201_2300_:
I also have some tea ready, so please, allow me
to treat you.
charaepi_ch0182_00_ilima/2301_1201_2400_: Oh? He seemed so tired just a moment ago.
charaepi_ch0182_00_ilima/2301_1201_2500_: It almost looks like he’s begging for a snack.
charaepi_ch0182_00_ilima/2301_1201_2600_: Maybe his hunger’s stronger than his sleepiness.
